name: Prison Escape (itch) (Analisse, fungifurball)
description:
Hello and welcome to Prison Escape. You play as a criminal trying to get out of jail. Play through three lengthy levels to escape and enjoy the fine blue sky. 

Team Role:

Analisse in charge of Background Assets, Title & Lose Scene, Level Design and Code;

Cindy  in charge of Character Animation, Level Design, Background Music, and Code;
